trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir støtte for utforming i en visuelle utformeren for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch to a designer view (such as **Design** view in [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control markup is parsed.
trans-unit.target: I en visuelle utformeren når du bytter til en designer visning (eksempel **utformingen** Vis i [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]), <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen markup analyseres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: A design-time version of the control is then created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: En utformingen versjon av kontrollen opprettes på utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: When you switch to source view, the design-time control is persisted as the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Når du bytter til kildevisningen, skal utformingen-kontrollen opprettholdes som markup for websiden.

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: Klassen LinqDataSourceDesigner gir støtte for utforming for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen i en visuelle utformeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of items that are used to create an action list menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste med elementer som brukes til å opprette en liste handling-menyen under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the action list items.
trans-unit.target: En samling som inneholder handlingen elementene.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called by the design host.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>metoder kan kalles ved utformingen verten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method can be called if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>metoder kan kalles hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollere implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the CanConfigure property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet CanConfigure egenskapsverdien er `true`.

trans-unit.source: If the CanConfigure property is `true`, the **Configure Data Source** menu item is displayed in the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen CanConfigure `true`, **konfigurere datakilden** menyelementet vises i den **LinqDataSource oppgaver** meny med tilknyttede kontrollen i visual utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: When this item is selected, the **Configure Data Source** wizard is started.
trans-unit.target: Når dette elementet er valgt, den **konfigurere datakilden** veiviseren er startet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>metoden kan være kall; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called by the design host.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>metoder kan kalles ved utformingen verten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method can be called if all the following conditions are true: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>metoder kan kalles hvis alle følgende betingelser er oppfylt: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollere implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextTypeName%2A> property contains a value.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextTypeName%2A>Inneholder en verdi for egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If these conditions are true, the CanRefreshSchema property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis disse vilkårene er oppfylt, CanRefreshSchema egenskapsverdien er `true`.

trans-unit.source: If the CanRefreshSchema is `true`, the **Refresh Schema** menu item is displayed in the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Hvis CanRefreshSchema `true`, **Oppdater skjemaet** menyelementet vises i den **LinqDataSource oppgaver** meny med tilknyttede kontrollen i visual utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>metoden kan være kall; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Launches the data source configuration wizard in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Starter konfigurasjonen for datakilde i utformingen verten.

trans-unit.source: The Configure method starts the **Configure Data Source** wizard on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Konfigurer starter den **konfigurere datakilden** veiviseren i visual utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The Configure method is called when the **Configure Data Source** menu item is selected on the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurer-metoden kalles når den **Konfigurer datakilden** menyelementet er valgt i den **LinqDataSource oppgaver** meny med den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The **Configure Data Source** menu item appears on the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den **konfigurere datakilden** menyelementet vises på den **LinqDataSource oppgaver** menyen når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the type that contains the property whose value has the data that you want to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på typen som inneholder egenskapen der verdien inneholder dataene du vil hente.

trans-unit.source: The name of the class to retrieve data from.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på klassen for å hente data fra.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value for the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi for sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> instance, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: I en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>forekomsten, angi denne egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: This property shadows a property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen skygger en egenskap i den tilknyttede kontrollen, og er ment for internt bruk.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether rows can be deleted from the data source at run time.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om rader kan slettes fra datakilden på kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the delete operation is enabled for users of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sletteoperasjonen er aktivert for brukere av den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> serverforekomsten; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether rows can be inserted into the data source at run time.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om rader til datakilden ved kjøretid.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the insert operation is enabled for users of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis insert-operasjonen er aktivert for brukere av den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> serverforekomsten; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether rows in the data source can be updated at run time.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om rader i datakilden kan oppdateres på kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the update operation is enabled for users of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om oppdateringen er aktivert for brukere av den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> serverforekomsten; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a data source view that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en datakildevisning med det angitte navnet.

trans-unit.source: The name of the view to return.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på visningen til å returnere.

trans-unit.source: An object whose name is specified by viewName; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Et objekt med navnet er angitt i viewName ; ellers .

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of available views.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste over tilgjengelige visninger.

trans-unit.source: A collection with one element that contains the name "DefaultView".
trans-unit.target: En samling med ett element som inneholder navnet "DefaultView".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that is used when the Group By clause is being created.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som skal brukes når setningsdelen Group By opprettes.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the properties that are used for grouping data.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder egenskapene som brukes til å gruppere data.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control designer and loads the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer kontrollen designer og laster inn den angitte komponenten.

trans-unit.source: The object to initialize.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som ble ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value for the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi for sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> instance, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: I en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>forekomsten, angi denne egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: This property shadows a property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen skygger en egenskap i den tilknyttede kontrollen, og er ment for internt bruk.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that is used when the Order By clause is being created.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som skal brukes når det opprettes Order By-setningsdelen.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the properties that are used for sorting the data.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder egenskapene som brukes til å sortere dataene.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that is used when the Order Groups By clause is being created.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som skal brukes når setningsdelen Order grupper By opprettes.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the properties that are used for sorting grouped data.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder egenskapene som brukes til sortering av grupperte data.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to add properties or remove properties in the properties grid.
trans-unit.target: Brukes av designer for å legge til egenskaper eller Fjern egenskaper i rutenettet egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The properties to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene som skal filtreres.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer skjemaet fra den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The design host calls the RefreshSchema method only if <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Utformingen verten kaller RefreshSchema metoden bare hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>er `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress all data source events until the schema is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du vil skjule alle datakildehendelser før skjemaet er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that contains values for the select operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir strengen som inneholder verdier for select-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A string that is used when the Select clause is being created.
trans-unit.target: En streng som skal brukes når Select-setningsdelen opprettes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the service provider that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter tjenesteleverandøren som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the service provider.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer tjenesteleverandøren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*>for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> forekomsten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the class that contains the data.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på klassen som inneholder dataene.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value for the Update operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> instance, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: I en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>forekomsten, angi denne egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: This property shadows a property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen skygger en egenskap i den tilknyttede kontrollen, og er ment for internt bruk.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where*>for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where*> property.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where*>
